review: last train home was a beautiful experience for me once i realized that i just needed to stealth kill everything i possibly could and only diverge from that formula when absolutely forced to  the strategic layer was fun and challenging and i was delighted to be able to finish with no one having died on my watch   not a ton of replay value but it was a wonderful time while it lasted

i love this game great acting good story great gameplay voices the worst thing on this game ive encountered as ive finished it was playing full mission intro when restarting the mission not the videos but the chat but this can be avoided by saving at the start of the mission and loading that instead of restarting thus leaving restart only when other soldier setup is needed
great story and gameplay elements really enjoyed it i wish i could continue playing it on steam deck but the game has no controller support the text is small and performance is bad even on a beefy pc

compelling fictional story mixed with action and trying to deal with natural events ie food shortage hunger bitter cold morale etc  lots to learn and characters have their own traits which benefits trade and foraging  overall a fantastic train journey so far

wow just wow what a masterpiece  this game is incredible the story and the action itself had me gripped like no other rts has the brutality of this game also had me to full attention there were even several moments in the game where my heart was in my mouth  i completed the story in roughly 20 hours and i enjoyed every second
